extendedInfo.description: 2nd Place in Best App for Middle School Student: http://bestappever.com/awards/2011/winner/msed~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Practice English Grammar helps you learn English grammar with the principle âPractice makes perfectâ. Learning English in very simple way (and even without internet)Practice English Grammar contains many pages of grammar lessons explaining the grammar topics of the tests. With over 500 questions in 16 topics, this app helps you practice the basic usage of English grammar at an elementary level.This app works even offline. You only need an Internet connection to download additional content packages.The following topics are covered in this app:AdjectivesAdverbsComparatives and SuperlativesGerundInfinitiveModal VerbsNounPast SimplePast ContinuousPresent ContinuousPresent SimplePronounReported SpeechSome and AnyArticleConjunctionsOther topics of english grammar will be included in another app of the âPractice English Grammarâ app series.Tests in âPractice English Grammarâ have not only multiple choice questions but also other interactive question types such as multiple response, matching, fill in the blank, text response numeric response etc.. . Some questions contain also media contents such as images, audios and videos which make your learning sessions more fun and interactive.Comprehensive statistics help you monitor your progress, so that you do not learn the same things again and again but something new.This app will be constantly updated with new content and tests which help you continually refresh your knowledge.If you find any errors in the content as well as functionality, please send me feedback so that I can improve the app. Email:testsstore@googlemail.com .

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Helpful, its very good app and help me to improve my english skill. I love it so much. Thanks a lots.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ohh...
reviews.comment: Way too many bugs and mistakes, unfortunately. However as long as people know that those are bugs, it is okay for practicing.
reviews.author: Pavlo Ryabokon

reviews.title: Few things needing to be fixed
reviews.comment: When I take the tests, I check the results and it says my answer is wrong even though I wrote the exact same answer. So they\'re basically marking my answers and correcting it to make it the exact same. It\'s annoying, my \'wrong\' answer is actually right.
reviews.author: Jade Cheng

reviews.title: Helpful but not perfect just like real school!
reviews.comment: Just like our school statement  isn\'t teaching to real life needs. Example: I tested the reading one. A woman departed to go home at 5pm, she then had to walk to the bus stop and wait a \"long time\" (long enough to buy a paper) for the bus. What time did she go home? 5PM or when the bus arrived? Nope, 5pm.    Reading test does not allow paraphrasing either. (wake  up, get up etc)
reviews.author: A Google User
